description: This file defines a React functional component called Header for the frontend of a web application. It provides navigation links and authentication-related actions (login, logout, user profile). It uses React hooks and React Router for routing and navigation.

methods.name: Header()
methods.description: React functional component rendering the application's header with navigation and authentication controls

methods.name: handleLogout
methods.description: Handles user logout by calling the logout function and navigating to the home page
